## CrudConnector.delete() method

Delete an entity

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
delete?(modelClass: Class<Entity>, entity: EntityData, options?: Options): Promise<boolean>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  modelClass | <code>Class&lt;Entity&gt;</code> | The model class |
|  entity | <code>EntityData</code> | The entity instance or data |
|  options | <code>Options</code> | Options for the operation |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<boolean>`

Promise<true> if an entity is deleted, otherwise Promise<false>
